title: A declaration of his Excellency Sir Thomas Fairfax and his Councell of Warre. Delivered by Colonell Sir Hardresse Waller, and other officers of the Army, to the House of Peeres, upon Munday the 17 of January, 1647. With the Lords Answer thereunto. Die Lun√¶, 17 Januarii. 1647. Ordered by the Lords assembled in Parliament, that this declaration of the Generall and his Councell of Warre, with the answer thereunto, be forthwith printed and published. Joh. Brown. Cler. Parliamentorum.
author: England and Wales. Army. Council.
publicationStmtPublisher: for John Wright at the Kings Head in the old Bayley,
